picked_headlines.summary: EternaAI eases clinical documentation with real-time AI note-taking.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This headline highlights a product that leverages AI to solve a real-world problem in healthcare, appealing to both technical and management audiences.

picked_headlines.summary: DevProd teams adapt to AI, focusing on SDLC improvements.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article is crucial for understanding how AI is reshaping engineering management and development processes, making it relevant for both engineers and stakeholders.

digest:
- *AI-designed antibodies* could revolutionize treatment options, offering hope for diseases previously considered untreatable. Read more at https://www.notboring.co/p/weekly-dose-of-optimism-163
- *Cryopreservation advancements* are paving the way for long-term biological storage solutions, potentially transforming organ transplants and fertility treatments. More details at https://www.notboring.co/p/weekly-dose-of-optimism-163
- *Huntington's disease treatment breakthrough* offers new hope for patients, with research indicating promising results. Discover more at https://www.notboring.co/p/weekly-dose-of-optimism-163
